vulgarity and foolishness inexcusable to Blanchot

writing is triumph, manic life-after-life insurance, indiscreet, exhibitionistic, even if  we read no “that’s me there” in it (this increase in discretion is more surplus-value of triumph), supplement of triumph, enough to make you sick
Derrida says this against Nietzsche: triumph over oneself is also a pursuit of power (Gewalt)
no paradigmatic text, only cryptic haunting from mark to mark, no piece, no metonymy, no integral corpus, thus no fetishism
double invagination, through labor of translation, can be brought to bear on gaine in Glas [cf. GLAS p. 210 “against” Hegel, Marx, and Freud on subject of fetishism]
to speak of writing, triumph, as living on, is to denounce [Freud’s] manic fantasy (not w/out repeating it)

HASD.content: against Wittgenstein’s imposed silence > one must not avoid speaking = it is necessary that there be a trace

“one day accounting will have to take place” of the damage of superficial reading
Derrida links Austin’s usage of phrases “in general” & “properly speaking”
de Man against periodization—form of dramatizing non-historical arguments [see ROP p. 114 only speak in terms of age through citation]
de Man: against Schlegel, Hegel on irony’s mastery, way it rises above finite determinations

A.content: when someone suggests a solution to an impasse, that person ceases to understand, if he ever did

POOF.content: Nietzsche against the levellers (Nivellirer), those who blame all misery on existing society [they are unfree, no solitude, ludicrously superficial]

compulsive droning of political “realism” that would refuse to read all the warnings & pleas of disjunction > what does it mean that, henceforth, ineluctable voice of necessity (its most responsible voice) resounds in this way [in disjunction, what has reality become?]?

OH.content: [Naas quotes from interview] precipitating contacts and articulations: dogmatism, confusion, opportunism

FSW.content: against Freud?: a rigorous determination of the anomaly [btwn word-representation & think-representation in dreams]  is impossible

FWT.content: Derrida doesn’t want deconstruction to be used to denigrate, injure, diminish necessity of force of movement, and if it is necessary to do so in polemics, he regrets it in advance
microclimate of terror, plots as perverse as the evil one claims to be attacking [re: new sexual harassment regulations] > sexual harassment exists, no only in the U.S.!
Derrida attacks intellectuals who close their eyes, who did not read, know how to read, unable to read, did not want to read [re: Renaud Camus affair, anti-Semitism ]

against Adorno’s “no poetry” > instead, a call for writing, just thought: to be faithful to an other one cannot internalize, categorize, justice to be invented; “a voice of sheer silence,” [Laporte, Une voix de fin silence] enjoins us to begin again tout autre ——testify to what we can neither forget nor recall, a testimony w/out force of verdict or death sentence, to not write risks worst betrayal
how to guard, watch over, what can’t be watched over, internalized > paradox of fidelity to tout autre > watch over tout autre w/out tout autre dissolving/identifying w/ same in the same

agrees/disagrees w/ Foucault’s claim death is less visible > spectral logic invades everything: work of mourning, technē of image; visibility is deferred, perhaps, transformation of visible field > never have things been as “visible” in global space as they are today
against Sartre’s idea that anti-Semitism produces the Jew

Derrida wary of every “return of the subject,” even in least dogmatic of returns, like that found in late Foucault (all “returns” omit rigorous reading of Heidegger)

rant against non-reading pedants, dogmatists, full of fear, right to confuse everything in authoritarian manner

BSi.content: [Derrida savages Agamben’s dogmatism in declaring who was “first,” then dogmatism in accusation of negligence, points out abyss of neglect, “one is always a priori negligent,” asks about the ethical responsibility in Levinas’ anarchy (no first)]
